name: The Unlucky King
body:
### What is this
This is a platform game made under 13kb total size - for js13kgames.com programming contest.

### Plot
Your king is terribly unlucky... if you help him you may marry your love the beautiful princess Blumhilda.

### How to play
Move right and left with the arrows,  jump with space-bar.


### Author
By Iftah Haimovitch  (@iftahh)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
